snippet: If not for a luxury cruise ship that failed to reach her destination on her maiden voyage in 1912, many New Yorkers would be remembering the epic and icy conflagration that engulfed and encased a tower in Lower Manhattan earlier that same year.
abstract: If not for a luxury cruise ship that failed to reach her destination on her maiden voyage in 1912, many New Yorkers would be remembering the epic and icy conflagration that engulfed and encased a tower in Lower Manhattan earlier that same year.

headline.main: Consumed in Fire, Cloaked in Ice, Equitable's Headquarters Fell 100 Years Ago
headline.print_headline: 100 Years Ago Today,City’s First Skyscraper Met Fire, Then Ice
